H0.text: Which sauce is made from mayonnaise, chopped capers and onions. Remoulade

H1.text: Which sauce is made from mayonnaise, chopped capers and onions. Aioli

H2.text: Which sauce is made from mayonnaise, chopped capers and onions. Béarnaise

H3.text: Which sauce is made from mayonnaise, chopped capers and onions. Tartare

A4.text: Purists insist that true aioli contains garlic and no other seasoning (except salt).

A5.text: Aioli is an emulsion of garlic and olive oil; it is found in the cuisines of the northwest Mediterranean.

A6.text: Béarnaise sauce is a sauce made of clarified butter, egg yolk, white wine vinegar, and herbs.
